TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CollectionView extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged, class System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView, class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
Public Class CollectionView Inherits DispatcherObject Implements ICollectionView, IEnumerable, INotifyCollectionChanged, INotifyPropertyChanged

public ref class CollectionView : System::Windows::Threading::DispatcherObject, System::Collections::IEnumerable, System::Collections::Specialized::INotifyCollectionChanged, System::ComponentModel::ICollectionView, System::ComponentModel::INotifyPropertyChanged
type CollectionView = class inherit DispatcherObject interface ICollectionView interface IEnumerable interface INotifyCollectionChanged interface INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 代表對分組、排序、篩選以及巡覽資料集合的檢視。

span.span: Represents a view for grouping, sorting, filtering, and navigating a data collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不應該在程式碼中建立這個類別的物件。You should not create objects of this class in your code. 若要建立集合檢視的集合，其中只會實作，建立物件，並將集合以屬性，並從檢視集合的 get屬性。To create a collection view for a collection that only implements , create a object, add your collection to the property, and get the collection view from the property. 您可以想像的集合檢視繫結來源集合，可讓您巡覽及顯示排序、 篩選和群組查詢，完全不必管理基礎來源集合本身為基礎的集合之上的層級。You can think of a collection view as a layer on top of a binding source collection that allows you to navigate and display the collection based on sort, filter, and group queries, all without having to manipulate the underlying source collection itself. 如果來源集合實作介面，引發變更事件傳播至檢視。If the source collection implements the interface, the changes that raise the event are propagated to the views. 因為檢視不會變更基礎來源集合，來源集合可以有多個與其相關聯的檢視。Because a view does not change the underlying source collection, a source collection can have multiple views associated with it. 使用檢視，您可以在不同的方式顯示相同的資料。By using views, you can display the same data in different ways. 例如，您可以使用兩個檢視的集合上`Task`以顯示工作物件先後依照優先權在頁面的一個組件和依區域列出在頁面的另一個組件分組。For example, you can use two views on a collection of `Task` objects to show tasks sorted by priority on one part of the page and grouped by area on another part of the page. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]應用程式，所有集合都具有檢視相關聯的預設集合。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications, all collections have an associated default collection view. 而不是直接使用集合，繫結引擎一律會透過相關聯的檢視存取集合。Rather than working with the collection directly, the binding engine always accesses the collection through the associated view. 若要取得的預設檢視，請使用方法。To get the default view, use the method. 內部類別根據是僅實作的集合的預設檢視。An internal class based on is the default view for collections that implement only . 已實作的集合的預設檢視。 is the default view for collections that implement . 已實作的集合的預設檢視或。 is the default view for collections that implement or . 或者，您可以在其中建立您的集合中的檢視[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用類別，並將您的控制項繫結到該檢視。Alternatively, you can create a view of your collection in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] by using the class and then bind your control to that view. 類別是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]表示類別。The class is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] representation of the class. 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 排序和群組資料使用 XAML 中的檢視](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-sort-and-group-data-using-a-view-in-xaml.md)。For an example, see [How to: Sort and Group Data Using a View in XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-sort-and-group-data-using-a-view-in-xaml.md). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 繫結集合 」 中[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information, see "Binding to Collections" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). 若要設定在檢視[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，使用類別。To set a view in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], use the class. 已[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]表示法類別，而且會公開最常使用的成員類別。 is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] representation of the class, and it exposes the most commonly used members of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CurrentItem As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ CurrentItem { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得檢視中的目前項目。

span.span: Gets the current item in the view.

value.span: 檢視的目前項目。

span.span: The current item of the view.

value.span: 根據預設，集合的第一個項目一開始會是目前項目。

span.span: By default, the first item of the collection starts as the current item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合檢視支援目前的記錄指標的概念。Collection views support the concept of a current record pointer. 當您瀏覽集合檢視中的物件，您要移動的記錄指標，可讓您擷取存在於集合中的該特定位置的物件。As you navigate through the objects in a collection view, you are moving a record pointer that allows you to retrieve the object that exists at that particular location in the collection. 請注意，移動目前的記錄指標的任何排序或篩選的一些互動會套用至集合。Note that moving the current record pointer has some interactions with any sorting or filtering that is applied to the collection. 排序會保留目前的記錄指標上選取，最後一筆記錄，但集合檢視其周圍重組結構。Sorting preserves the current record pointer on the last record selected, but the collection view is restructured around it. （選取的記錄可能已在之前，清單開頭，但現在選取的記錄可能會在中間的某處）。如果該選取項目在篩選之後仍然在檢視中，篩選就會保留選取的記錄。(Perhaps the selected record was at the beginning of the list before, but now the selected record might be somewhere in the middle.) Filtering preserves the selected record if that selection remains in view after the filtering. 否則，目前的記錄指標會設定為已篩選的集合檢視的第一筆記錄。Otherwise, the current record pointer is set to the first record of the filtered collection view. 目前的項目集合的繫結會自動繫結的目標是單一值。The current item of the collection is bound to automatically if the target of a binding is a singleton value. 如果目標是，與選取的項目同步處理目前的項目。If the target is an , the current item is synchronized with the selected item. 例如，如果清單方塊繫結至集合，與目前選取的項目同步處理。For example, if a list box is bound to a collection, the is synchronized with the currently selected item.

para.span: 傳遞貨幣處理到另一個內部呼叫的類別物件應該覆寫這個屬性; 所有其他衍生的類別應該使用方法來更新基底類別中所儲存的目前值。

span.span: Only classes that pass currency handling calls to another internal object should override this property; all other derived classes should use the method to update the current values stored in the base class.

summary.span: 進入延後循環，您可以用來合併變更到檢視，並且延遲自動重新整理。

span.span: Enters a defer cycle that you can use to merge changes to the view and delay automatic refresh.

returns.span: 物件，可用來處置呼叫物件。

span.span: An object that you can use to dispose of the calling object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 典型的用法是建立`using`範圍使用這個方法，然後放在範圍內的 多個檢視變更呼叫。The typical usage is to create a `using` scope with this method and then place multiple view-changing calls within the scope. 延後循環結束之前，這會延遲自動重新整理。This delays automatic refresh until the defer cycle is exited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個方法會傳回-1 以外的索引必須一律為 true，檢視 [索引-1] < 項目 < = 的檢視 [index]，比較進行的地方使用方法的檢視中，如果有的話。If this method returns an index other than -1, it must always be true that view[index-1] < item <= view[index], where the comparisons are done using the method of the view, if one exists. 這個特定方法的行為由一些事件處理常式，以加速插入和刪除的反應。This particular behavior of the method is used by some event handlers to speed up reaction to insertion and deletion. 在衍生的類別不會覆寫這個方法，如果接聽程式會執行二進位搜尋，使用方法。If the derived class does not override this method, a listener does a binary search using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合檢視支援目前的記錄指標的概念。Collection views support the concept of a current record pointer. 當您瀏覽集合檢視中的物件，您要移動的記錄指標，可讓您擷取存在於集合中的該特定位置的物件。As you navigate through the objects in a collection view, you are moving a record pointer that allows you to retrieve the object that exists at that particular location in the collection.

summary.span: 取得值，表示檢視是否需要重新整理。

value.span: 如果檢視需要重新整理，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the view needs to be refreshed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性指示是否檢視的內部狀態已變更，而且需要方法呼叫。This property indicates if the internal state of the view has changed and requires a method call. 典型的案例是如果或類似已加入至檢視在延後的重新整理循環的檢視時 (請參閱)。The typical scenario is if a or similar has been added to the view while the view is in a deferred refresh cycle (see ). 在此案例中，不需要明確呼叫需要; 只要延後的重新整理週期結束後，檢視重新整理會自動呼叫。In this scenario, no explicit call to is needed; as soon as the deferred refresh cycle ends, the view calls refresh automatically.

summary.span: 這個方法可從衍生類別的建構函式呼叫。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從衍生類別建構函式中呼叫這個多載。Call this overload from constructor of a derived class. 未通過屬性，這是虛擬屬性，做為`count`。Do not pass the property, which is a virtual property, as `count`. 請改為傳遞的內部計數，表示集合。Instead, pass the count of the internal that represents the collection. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks No puede agregar要傳回的 （空的） 集合因為基底類別不支援排序。You cannot add a to the returned (empty) collection because the base class does not support sorting. 相反地，使用 衍生的類別和，並支援排序。Instead, use the derived classes and that do support sorting. 此外，請檢查屬性，才能新增或移除物件以避免發生例外狀況。Also, check the property before adding or removing objects to avoid an exception.
